name: Chubby & Flubby
description:
Chubby and Flubby are twins and the ultimate frenimies, and have fallen into a hole. Be the first to reach top using a variety of power ups, but Twins are connected so power-up applies to both of them.
A clumsy mess of fun!

Chubby controls with "WASD" and Flubby controls with the "ArrowKeys"

Made by:

Amanda Niess

Andreas Clement Holmgaard

Johannes Heidelbach Dyrbye

Pelle Bloch Atkinson
